mdRecord.dcterms:title: Treasury Department, Comptroller's Office, May 5th, 1808: (Circular.) : To collectors, naval officers and surveyors. : Sir, You will herewith receive, for your information and government, the following acts of Congress, passed at the last session
Circular, to collectors, naval officers and surveyors
To collectors, naval officers and surveyors
